newValue.title: Seeking the Orb of Forgotten Power
newValue.description: The ancient artifact known as the Orb of Forgotten Power lies hidden within The Shattered Sanctum. Legends say it holds the key to restoring balance in the shattered realms.

objectives.description: Navigate through the Catacombs of Shadows and uncover its secrets.
Unlock the ancient wards surrounding the Orb on the altar.
